Made from the optimal blend of cotton fabrics, youll be certain your choice will be suitable for every room and function.

products.title: Mulberry, Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: When you take a closer look at mulberry blue you come to appreciate the fine craftsmanship and artisan skill that goes into every square inch. The subtle pattern is traditional and yet contemporary, and allows you to work in a whole host of new shades and hues into your decor. If you want to create your very own country bolthole, why not combine mulberry blue with a sanded down wooden floor, some cracked leather couches, and a log burner on a slate hearth? Add these touches one by one, and you'll have the sitting room you never want to leave.

products.title: Mulberry, Plum - Roller Blind
products.description: If you find that you want to add a unique country meets contemporary touch to your decor, look no further than mulberry plum. The authentic artisan style patterning combines in perfect harmony with the on-trend colours to create a visual that lives long in the memory. Take your time when considering which room to add a touch of plum to. The upstairs landing can be a great option if you combine your new roller blinds with a vase of fresh cut flowers and an eclectic gallery wall.

products.title: Original, Plum - Roller Blind
products.description: The soft cream fabric of the original in plum offers a light-filtering background to muted lilacs, baby blues, and hushed plums, giving a homely yet modern feel. This stylish blind is placed on an easy-to-use roll mechanism, making it practical as well as pretty. For a light and airy look in the bedroom, go for cream walls to make the plum stand out on its own, and complement with colours already in the blind's palette.

products.title: Mulberry, Dusk - Roller Blind
products.description: The beauty of mulberry dusk is that the relaxing country vibes set your mind at ease the moment you walk through the door. Take a closer look and you'll soon lose yourself in a new range of decor options that get your creativity racing. We love the idea of allowing dusk to take over the spotlight by using it as the starting point for a rustic meets country look in the bedroom. A matching throw on the bed and a couple of well chosen scatter cushions are just what you need to create the homely space you never want to leave.

products.title: Mulberry, Neutral - Roller Blind
products.description: Mulberry neutral gives you a starting point from which you can set the tone for your new decor. The relaxed and homely aesthetic is perfect when you want to add that warm and cosy feeling to any space your heart desires. Adding homely touches like slate coasters, logs by the fire, and jars of warm white fairy lights is a great direction to go in. Adding things just because you love the way they look is the name of the game here.

products.title: Verdi (Blackout), Dusty Plum - Roller Blind
products.description: Take a closer look at verdi (blackout) dusty plum and you'll soon see why it's a fabric that's proving to be a hit with all different styles of modern decor. The deep and moody purple is perfectly tempered by the intricate ornate patterning that shimmers gently in the light. Just what you need when having your home look its best is the only option. Pairing the deep tones of dusty plum with a zesty green or a powdered orange would be an inspired way to work in more natural shades.

products.title: Fagel Plum Roman Blind
products.description: Their fagel range will add the cosy feel to your home. This range comes in many colours which would suit any room. Revamp your home with the soft fabric and lovely colour of the fagel plum roman blind. Product id: db-arom0536 fabric colour: plum control type: sidewinder chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes fagel plum roman blind in purple.

products.title: Azurite Chenille Indigo Blue Curtain
products.description: Their azurite chenille range consists of textured plains with a velour soft-feel finish. This bold dark blue curtain fuses a plush, luxury feel in a contemporary blue tone to create a on trend room feature that is bound to be noticed. These rich navy curtains will look beautiful with dark wooden tones and will create a striking look when paired with rich jewel colours. All their curtains are lovingly handmade within the uk.

products.title: Alpaca Indigo Blue Curtain
products.description: Set to make a statement the alpaca indigo blue curtain will be sure to add character to your space with hand sketched alpaca's inspired by native american's they are geared up with feather head dressings and funky printed saddles how cute. The deep blue backdrop is striking and on trend. So where will you put this fun packed curtain? At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this curtain comes with their free five-year guarantee and customer-first service team.

products.title: Nordic, Indigo - Roman Blind
products.description: The sweet floral illustrations of the nordic in indigo have a contemporary, scandinavian feel to them, and the royal blue background is wonderfully offset by the ice white of the pattern, making for a homely yet modern roman blind. Choose an unusual colour scheme of blue and white for your kitchen, keeping the main items of flooring, walls, tiling, and units in these two colours. Then add an accent colour, perhaps yellow, lime, or orange, to bring the room to life.

products.title: Emi, Mulberry - Roman Blind
products.description: To help maximise a smaller space, use soothing pastel shades and attractive prints like the emi mulberry blind. A delicate arrangement of white and mauve inspired flowers sits on a soothing oatmeal base providing a refreshing burst of personality to any room in the home. Choose material in hues that will complement the striking colours of the mulberry, sticking to a comforting palette of dusky pink, mauve, and little bursts of fuschia.

products.title: Heathland, Indigo - Roman Blind
products.description: Form a distinctive and delicate look with the heathland indigo blind. The graceful, linen-like cloth, with its washed denim finish, forms a casual mood, whereas the charming dove and shrubbery print creates a tasteful style with refined elegance. To generate an attractive and peaceful realm in any room, combine the enchanting print of the indigo with other delicate and attractive patterns in complementing shades of blue and dove grey.

products.title: Mirabella Solar Crush Plum Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their mirabella collection are made from solar fabric. This means they utilize fabric technology that keeps your room warm in winter and cool in summer by absorbing heat from sunlight. This makes them an excellent choice for those who are looking for energy efficient and energy saving blinds. Featured here in their plum colour - perfect for those wanting to introduce some sophisticated colour into their room.

products.title: Faux Suede, Purple - Roman Blind
products.description: Create an elegant and regal look with the faux suede in purple, where daring and courageous mauve meets a soothing, velvety cloth to form an eye-catching blind with modish texture, gorgeous colouring, and stacks of style. Match the impressive purple with soft furnishings and fabrics in similar shades of aubergine and damson, creating a continued intense burst of colour full of tempting texture. Incorporate gilded accessories and golden hued oddments to form a more glamorous finish to an imperial look.

products.title: Como, Indigo - Roman Blind
products.description: When it comes to florals, the como range gets it right. And the indigo offers a deep shade of blue alongside a beautiful blue grey, resulting in a gorgeously moody canvas that combines both the classic and the contemporary. Use the indigo alongside navy blues and creams, in perhaps a main or guest bedroom, where you can complement these lovely florals with plush bedding and ornaments. Add in an accenting shade of yellow for some extra depth, vibrancy, and personality.

products.title: Hathaway, Indigo - Roman Blind
products.description: The hathaway indigo features an ornate pattern with a traditional vibe, displayed in deep navy indigo and soft cream, making for a striking and attractive roman blind. The 100% cotton fabric sits neatly in roman folds, perfectly suited for its purpose. Blend the indigo with cream walls and gold-toned soft furnishings for a look of real grandeur in your living room. Cream flooring and sofas will provide a fantastic base for gold and navy cushions, throws, and rugs, going for ultimate glamour.

products.title: Guarda Stripe, Indigo - Roman Blind
products.description: A contemporary blue and grey combo, the guarda stripe in indigo offers roughly painted stripes on a white background, giving an artistic look and feel to this roman blind. The cotton fabric sits neatly into roman folds, and you'll find it simple and easy to use. The indigo would make the ideal addition to a child's or teenager's bedroom, where soft grey walls will provide the perfect base for bolder blue tones in the form of wall art, toys, and ornaments.

products.title: Amelie, Mulberry - Roman Blind
products.description: The amelie mulberry completely encompasses true country style. Sat on a bed of grainy oatmeal are blossoming florals in a faded forest green and pretty lilacs and heathers. The rustic aesthetic is neatened somewhat by the structured arches of the roman, creating a sumptuous yet rural theme that will suit any country home. Bring your country kitchen to life by joining the mulberry with the natural weaves of wicker and hessian and accompanying with rustic, unfinished woods.

products.title: Origin, Plum - Vista Blind
products.description: Giving your home the finishing touches it deserves is all about adding style and substance in equal measure. Origin plum combines rich wholesome coloured fabric with an elegant voile that allows you to control the light levels in your room with ease. By bringing everything together in a series of clean modern cuts and lines the origin range allows you to give your home a truly modern touch of style.

products.title: Splash Smokey Purple Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Splash smokey purple is a soft chic purple perfect fit roller blind perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out perfect fit blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this on-trend purple blind is especially great for adding a soft splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Indigo Blue Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: A stylish dark blue/navy shade, splash indigo blue is a stylish, contemporary colour which will work well throughout the home, particularly in kitchens and conservatories as the fabric is moisture resistant. The perfect fit roller blind is an effective, no hassle way to fit a blind to any upvc window. The blind comes in a slimline frame and clips directly under the window beading, which means no drilling.

products.title: Kaleidoscope, Plum High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: Plum is the perfect deep relaxing colour for those looking to get away from it all once they get home. The soothing character of plum works in harmony with the high gloss finish to provide a crisp and clean aesthetic which allows you to make a feature of window spaces like never before. Add in blacks and whites to celebrate the extremes of the colour spectrum as your touch of plum sits handsomely in the middle taking pride of place as the focal point of your room.

products.title: Splash Smokey Purple Panel Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash smokey purple panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The rich purple panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm, saturated shade. As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,. 5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make. A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design.

products.title: Splash Sloe Purple Panel Blind
products.description: Their splash sloe purple panel blinds is a quick and stylish way to fill a space. This purple dimout fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with their 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.

products.description: Our plain blackout fabrics collection feature their most popular blackout colours. This tight woven plain fabric has a self coloured pvc backing which prevents any light filtering through - perfect for blocking out the light on those early summer mornings or helping night workers to get to sleep. products.description: If one colour spells luxury, it has to be purple. Create a homely yet romantic feel in the living room, blending the mulberry with cream walls, dark wooden floorboards, and brushed gold finishings.
